Text: do you plan on uploading the rams vs raiders game from week 2? it was blacked out in my area and i'm having a helluva time finding it! your uploads are the best!

@sporc

funny you say...the MKV files i DL are out of sync...ive never had syc problems with any avi. file so far but almost every MKV file i have played has been out of sync. 

anyways, as you said he can use mp4...as long as its not MKV...

once again thanks to phatwarez for everything...
